Definitely

Can anyone tell me why, in this day and age in which so few people apparently still believe in absolutes, everyone's favorite adverb is absolutely?

Just thought I'd ask.

Commenting is not available in this weblog entry.

—Katy at 2004-05-28T00:56:00

I'm still mad because 'unique' is no longer an absolute. When I was in high school you didn't say 'more unique'. It was 'more nearly unique'. I have been informed that 'more unique' is acceptable now and I'm mad about it. How can I correct people in a superior tone now? And I'm mad about 'argueably' , too.
